PatchEverything:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
PatchEverything:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

PatchEverything:TestingTesting.NAME: The Card Applies Everything
PatchEverything:TestingTesting.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Apply !M! million Stuff. Upgrade permanently. Can be upgraded any number of times.
PatchEverything:TestingTesting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Apply !M! million Stuff. Draw !BuxomPack:Draw! cards. Upgrade permanently. Can be upgraded any number of times.
